docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Sept. 5 -- In Latin America, the shape of things to come in the next decade and a half has been assuming a visible outline for eighteen months. In the present and still unclear projections, the emerging pattern indicates "a...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Sept. 5 -- In Latin America, the shape of things to come in the next decade and a half has been assuming a visible outline for eighteen months. In the present and still unclear projections, the emerging pattern indicates "a large and stable market for heavy industrial equipment."

headline.main: POTENTIAL BRIGHT IN LATIN MARKET; Studies by U. N. Find Good Future There for Heavy Industrial Equipment

docs.snippet: ROME, Sept. 7 -- Ten days of handshaking, lunching and negotiating in Paris, Munich and Rome have served to solidify harness racing on an international basis, Alvin L. Weil, secretary of Roosevelt Raceway, reported today.
